name: Politoed
flavorText:
If POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL hear its
echoing cry, they respond by gather­
ing from far and
wide.

previous.name: Sudowoodo
previous.flavorText:
Although it always
pretends to be a
tree, its composi­ tion appears to be
closer to a rock
than a plant.

next.name: Hoppip
next.flavorText:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.flavorText:
Its newly grown
legs prevent it
from running. It appears to prefer
swimming than
trying to stand.

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.flavorText:
Capable of living
in or out of
water. When out of water, it
sweats to keep
its body slimy.

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.flavorText:
An adept swimmer
at both the front
crawl and breast stroke. Easily
overtakes the best
human swimmers.

pokemon.name: Politoed
pokemon.flavorText:
If POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL hear its
echoing cry, they respond by gather­
ing from far and
wide.
